name: NSTouch.TouchTypeMask
desc: A bit mask identifying a direct or indirect touch type.

items.name: init(type: NSTouch.TouchType)
items.desc: Creates a new touch type mask from the touch type.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new touch type mask from the given raw value.

items.name: static var direct: NSTouch.TouchTypeMask
items.desc: A direct touch from a user's finger on a screen.

items.name: static var indirect: NSTouch.TouchTypeMask
items.desc: An indirect touch that is not on a screen, like a digitizer touch.
